title: 一到中午就犯困
author: 丢人素学姐
txt_content:
好困啊。。。。。。
还有几天论文答辩了，希望一切顺利。

replies.author: 午申
replies.txt_content: 注意点休息，最好在十一点半之前睡觉。

replies.author: nktdd551
replies.txt_content: 祝你好运，身体重要

replies.author: 海贼王#
replies.txt_content:
俗话说得好
坚持就是胜利
祝你好运

replies.author: 包子肉
replies.txt_content: good luck

replies.author: BUKI
replies.txt_content: 中午根本不想睡觉
我早上也困

replies.author: 神の手
replies.txt_content: 我似乎……一天都在犯困呢_(:з」∠

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content:
论文答辩？
很好奇是什么论文来的？
毕业论文？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
春困 夏乏 秋盹 冬眠

滑稽

replies.author: 丢人素学姐
replies.txt_content:
Oil 发表于 2018-5-19 18:19
论文答辩？
很好奇是什么论文来的？
毕业论文？
对 毕业论文

replies.author: 丢人素学姐
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2018-5-19 19:07
春困 夏乏 秋盹 冬眠

滑稽
太懂我了

replies.author: Virgo_Shaka
replies.txt_content: 一整天都困，晚上还得有安眠药才能睡着

replies.author: x892203652
replies.txt_content: 我也是，每次都被老师敲头，真尴尬

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: 我这几天中午一直睡不着

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content: 我早上打瞌睡....

replies.author: hjlqq20040619
replies.txt_content: 抽自己hhh

replies.author: iverson119
replies.txt_content: 我也是。。。感觉是一种体质
我下午1点2点才犯困

replies.author: :D--
replies.txt_content: 熬夜是硬伤

replies.author: :D--
replies.txt_content: 你多半是废了，
